Дифференцировка белых, бежевых и бурых адипоцитов под влиянием различных факторов (адаптировано из [14]
Differentiation of white, beige and brown adipocytes under the influence of various factors (adapted from [14]
Сокращения / Abbreviations: EBF2 – B cell factor-2; BMPs (BMP2, BMP4, BMP7) – bone morphogenetic proteins;
PPARγ – peroxisome proliferators-activated receptor γ; C/EBPs (C/EBPα, C/EBPβ) – CCAAT/enhancer-binding proteins; KLF – Krüppel-like factor; CREB (cAMP response element-binding protein); PRDM16 – positive regulatory
domain I-binding factor 16; PGC-1α – peroxisome proliferator-activated receptor gamma coactivator 1-alpha; Plac8 –
placental-specific protein 8; FOXC2 – forkhead box protein C2; COX2 – cyclooxygenase 2; TLE3 – transducin-like
enhancer protein 3; β3-AR агонист – агонист β3-адренорецептора (β-adrenergic receptor agonist); FGF21 – fibroblast growth factor 21
